data.text:
Honors & Awards

MVC Scholar-Athlete (Outdoor 2012)

Bradley Country Financial Scholar-Athlete of the Week (4-4-12)

MVC Commissioner's Academic Excellence Award (2014)

MVC Honor Roll (2015 & 2014)

Bradley AD Honor Roll (Fall 2010, Spring 2011, Fall 2011, Spring 2012, Fall 2012, Spring 2013, Fall 2013, Spring 2014 & Spring 2015)

Career Bests

6K: 20:37.06 (9/4/10)

4 Mile: 22:24 (9/16/13)

8K: 27:19.06 at the 2012 Louisville Classic

Track & Field Career Bests

Event Time Date Site 600 meters (indoor) 1:23.53 2/6/15 Meyo Invitational- South Bend, Ind. 800 meters (indoor) 1:57.24 2/13/15 Hoosier Hills- Bloomington, Ind. 800 meters (outdoor) 1:53.29 5/12/12 MVC Championship - Wichita, Kan. 1,500 meters (outdoor) 3:55.52 4/21/12 Gateway Classic - Edwardsville, Ill.

Senior (2014-15 Track): Clocked career-best times in both the 600 & 800 meters during the indoor season â€¦ Ran in the 800 meters during the outdoor campaign, posting the fastest time on the squad at the MVC Championship.

Senior (2013-14): Opened the fall with a career-best 4-mile time of 22:24 at the Bradley Intercollegiate.

Junior (2012-13): Ran in only two races during the cross country season and redshirted the outdoor track campaign ... Clocked a career-best 8K time at the Louisville Classic.

Sophomore (2011-12): Saw action in four meets and turned in an 8K career-best of 27:20 at the Illinois Intercollegiates ... Was 19th at the Illini Open in his final event of the year ... Had the top times in both 800 meters and 1,500 meters ... Qualified for the 800 meter finals at the MVC Championship, running a season-best 1:53.29 in the prelims ... Finished 8th in the 800 at the MVC Championship and 10th in the 1,500 meters.

Freshman (2010-11): Competed in five events as a freshman ... Had a season-best 8K time of 27:26 at the Bradley Classic.

Prep Overview: Lettered in cross country and track ... Qualified for the state championship in cross country.

Personal: The son of Dan and Julie Garland, Shane has two younger siblings: Jamie and Sydney ... Majoring in mechanical engineering.

Meet-by-Meet Times

Meet Distance Time Bradley Open 4 Mile 22:24 Illinois State Invitational 8K 29:13.26 SIU Edwardsville Invitational 8K 32.02.41

Meet Distance Time Bradley Open 8K 29:09 Illinois Intercollegiates 8K DNR Louisville Classic 8K 27:19.06 Bradley Classic 8K DNR

2011 (Sophomore)

Meet Distance Time Bradley Open 6K 20:53 Illinois Intercollegiate 8K 27:20 Notre Dame Invitational 5 Mile DNR Bradley Classic 8K 28:24 Illini Open 8K 28:41

2010 (Freshman)
